tool_description: Affordable Best Buy Product Info & Stock Scraper
title: Best Buy Stock Check

api_list.name: Get Product Info
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://best-buy-stock-check.p.rapidapi.com/productinfo/{best_buy_sku_id}"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "best-buy-stock-check.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())
